TopicTitle: Any good mod for ICBM parts?

Articles.Content:
Hi there, i really love building ICBMs. Only problem is that North Kerbin Dynamics Renewed removed the MIRV (aka the warhead)
I tried using the other nukes (BDArmory and NKDR but it doesnt work  
What i'd like:

-Reentry vehicle
-MIRV(s) [MRVs are also ok]

Im kinda new to this, so please excuse my errors.
